name: Paddler (mackron)
description:
Paddler is a simple Pong-like game I built for fun over about 15 hours or so. It's nothing special - just Pong.

I built Paddler in my little game engine I've been building as a hobby, and it's proven to be a useful little test for it. All of the game logic is implemented through the engine's scripting environment, so feel free to hit Shift+Tab to open up the engine's editor and do some modding if that's your thing.

Enjoy! (As much as you can at least - it's just Pong.)
